definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
lit. to count on a narrow abacus (idiom); petty and scheming selfishly/concerned with petty interests/selfish and uncaring of the interests of others/bean counter

sentences.english: However, all may have ambitions of their own.
sentences.chinese: 然而，每个人都可能打着自己的如意小算盘。

sentences.english: All of that advice might well remain apt today, but the recession has changed the calculus for many workers.
sentences.chinese: 上述建议现在依然适用，但衰退了许多人的小算盘。

definition: counting one's chickens before they are hatched
lit. to count on a narrow abacus (idiom); petty and scheming selfishly/concerned with petty interests/selfish and uncaring of the interests of others/bean counter
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to hesitate/to have second thoughts/to be concerned/to brood (over sth)/to complain
sit on the mountain and watch the tigers fight/watch in safety whilst others fight then reap the rewards when both sides are exhausted (idiom)
